page.title: 09EATING OUT IN WINDSOR
page.content: by Marc,Nicola,Ramayana The food available from restaurants in Windsor ranges from take-away fast food to haute cuisine. {Dinner Menu,Castle Hotel July 1985 {(opposite Windsor Castle) { Avocado Parfait Egg Washington (Strawberry (Oven baked with Vinaigrette) sweetcorn,mustard) Beef Consomme Special of the with Tomatoes Evening { { ******} Grilled Lamb Cutlets Julienne of (Fresh Tarragon) Pork Munshi Breast of Chicken (Light curry, Charlotte (filled sliced mangos with shrimps,mustard and kiwi) sauce) {COST:- Â£11.50} {
